name: public-rest-api-with-nodejs-lambda
main: npm install serverless && npx serverless deploy && npm test

scripts.start: npm install serverless && npx serverless deploy
scripts.test: curl -v $(aws cloudformation --region 'us-east-1' describe-stacks --stack-name public-rest-api-with-nodejs-lambda-dev --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`helloWorldEndpoint`].OutputValue' --output text) | jq '.'
